OCC: Off topic everyone, but I am sooo happy that Kurt Angle became King of
the Ring! It's true! It's true!

Plintissa decided to take a break and stop for a while. Train Wreck joined
her. Stranato continued his work, screwing up terribly, and no matter how
much persuasion, he wouldn't stop...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Logo morph" <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 26, 2000 8:23 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
> ::DarkMouse::
>
> She stood in front of Megatron.  She had a surge of energy run through her
> programmming.  It rebooted the initial program the Scorponok had installed
> in her. Her body shook slightly for a moment.
> Then she knelt down in front of Megatron.
> "Forgive me my commander. I was ovcer stepping my bounds.  I beg for your
> forgiveness on this matter my commander.  But please feel free to punish
me
> if you feel I deserve it."
> She went down on one knee and knelt down waiting for the cruching blow
from
> Megatron.
> "I ber forgiveness you greatness. I don't know what came over me."
> She actually let a tear fall from her eye and onto the floor.
> Blast her programming agian.  It let her think on her own when no one was
> around and kicked in when her commanders where near.  She hated that.
